context.p: You can open a document in Serna several ways:

xref.b: Opening a document in WYSIWYG mode

li.p: By default, documents are opened in WYSIWYG mode.
Serna automatically applies all the necessary metadata on opening a document, but you can also open a document with manually specified parameters.
Serna allows you to work with very large documents by collapsing portions of them.

xref.b: Opening a document in Text mode

li.p: You can open a document straight away in Text mode.

xref.b: Opening a document from the Recent Files list

li.p: The last 9 documents opened in Serna can be opened from the list of recent files. In this case, some meta information is applied exactly as it was the previous time.
